Tunable.name: DISTANCE_TO_FADE_SIM_OUT
Tunable.description: Distance at which a Sim will start fading out if tuned as such.

TunableList.name: CARRIED_DEFAULT_AFFORDANCES
TunableList.description: The interactions for Sims' default "Be Carried" postures. These interactions are used whenever Sims are transitioning into such postures.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The species that this affordance is intended for.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The default interaction to push for Sims of this species.

Tunable.name: INCREMENTAL_REBUILD_THRESHOLD
Tunable.description: The posture graph will do a full rebuild when exiting build/buy if there have been more than this number of modifications to the posture graph. Otherwise, an incremental rebuild will be done, which is much faster for small numbers of operations, but slower for large numbers. Talk to a gameplay engineer before changing this value.

TunableList.name: POSTURE_PROVIDING_AFFORDANCES
TunableList.description: Additional posture providing interactions that are not tuned on any object. This allows us to add additional postures for sims to use. Example: Kneel on floor.

TunableList.name: SIM_DEFAULT_AFFORDANCES
TunableList.description: The interactions for Sims' default postures. These interactions are used to kickstart Sims; are pushed on them after resets, and are used as the default cancel replacement interaction.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The species that this affordance is intended for.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The default interaction to push for Sims of this species.

TunableList.name: SWIM_DEFAULT_AFFORDANCES
TunableList.description: The interactions for Sims' default swimming postures. These interactions are used as a Sim's default affordance while in a pool.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The species that this affordance is intended for.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The default interaction to push for Sims of this species.
